Name: Sheriff Rage
About the game: The Sheriff of SobIim City, while at his post, is trying to prevent the invasion of alien forces and save the inhabitants of the city from attacks by alien forces. As the sheriff of the city, destroy many waves of creepy opponents without dodging bosses or dodging their projectiles. Only the weapons of the wild west are offered to your arsenal, as opposed to the latest technologies and alien invaders. Clear the city and become a hero Features: -Beautiful drawing - interesting gameplay; -Many enemies
